Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Fulton
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Washington, Sacramento; SB Sacramento, Warren, California, due to street blockage near California/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near California/Fulton, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Sacramento, Warren, and California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #201 Central/Ridge, #206 Evanston Circulator Temporary Reroute at Ridge/Crain
ShortDescription: 201 Central/Ridge, 206 Evanston Circulator buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Dempster and Ridge due to, street blockage near Ridge/Crain.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#201 Central/Ridge, #206 Evanston Circulator buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Dempster and Ridge due to, street blockage near Ridge/Crain.

Allow extra travel time.
